forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn delicately unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, a veil of cloudiness lingers, expected to give way to a welcome brightness as the day progresses. The air, already crisp with a hint of the Pacific breeze, holds a promise of clarity. By mid-morning, the city will bask under a mostly sunny sky, though temperatures will gracefully oscillate in the low mid-sixties. The invigorating winds, brushing through the streets, add a lively rhythm to the morning, gusting from the southwest, creating a symphony of coolness that invites both movement and stillness.

Dress in layers to embrace the ebb and flow of the day, whether stowing a light jacket for the chillier morning or shedding it as the sun takes center stage, nurturing a sense of openness. Given the vibrant conditions, a stroll along the waterfront might provide an exquisite way to absorb the energy of the city—perhaps enjoying the sights and sounds of early risers waking up, all intertwined with the city’s gentle hum. For those seeking a contemplative retreat, a quiet bench in one of the nearby parks could be the perfect spot to sip coffee, allowing the beauty of San Francisco to unfold.
